<!channel> Hi all -- we started using a second ECR registry for some images; this broke Crafting image pulls. If you are _still_ having problems with images, please

1. Resync your sandbox (no need to reset the base image)
2. Check `~/.docker/config.json`
3. Check `~/.aws/config` 
4. Check `~/.aws/credentials`
5. 
You can delete/move the last 3 files with this command, and Crafting will re-create them with the correct content:

```rm -rf ~/.docker ~/.aws```
For reference, here is what the two files should look like. Only this configuration works in all cases!

```cs/mfichman❯ cat ~/.docker/config.json
{
  "credHelpers": {
     "gcr.io": "gcloud",
     "549230430157.dkr.ecr.us-east-2.amazonaws.com": "ecr-login",
     "601729033846.dkr.ecr.us-east-2.amazonaws.com": "ecr-login"
  }
}```
```cs/mfichman❯ cat ~/.aws/config
[profile default]
region = us-east-2
credential_process = idfed aws 519787998606 crafting-sandbox-role```
*Also* if `docker pull` is hanging for you...restart the Docker daemon. Here is the command to use:

```sudo pkill dockerd && sudo pkill containerd && sudo pkill dockerd && sudo pkill containerd```
(Yes, you have to pkill 2x b/c dockerd tries to exit gracefully when hit with the first SIGTERM.)

If this *still* doesn't fix your problems: Send me your sandbox link in a DM. Ty all!
